name: Pickleball Paddles Set of 2/4, USAPA Approved Carbon Fiber Surface Pickle Ball Set - 14mm PP Honeycomb Core of Lightweight Pickleball Rackets -Suitable for Beginners' Training and Game（Blue）
short_description: 【Premium Raw Carbon & Fiberglass Surface】Our pickleball paddle features a raw glass surface with a unique textured design that provides exceptional spin control. The design helps you easily manage the spin and direction of the ball. Whether you're serving, dinking, or transitioning between offense and defense, the precise spin gives you complete control over every shot.

【Premium Material and Thicker Design】The core of the paddle is made of high-performance polypropylene honeycomb, being thickened to 0.55 inches, providing exceptional power transfer. This high-quality core design allows each shot to be incredibly sharp and fast, giving you an edge in competition and increasing your chances of winning.

【Lightweight & Wide Design】The 7.9 inches widened surface significantly increases the ball contact area racket area, providing more sweet spots for the perfect shot. These paddles are suitable for players of all levels. The medium weight range of 7.8 oz ensures a balance of power and control

【Superior Construction】The paddle is designed with an aerodynamic curved frame to reduce air resistance, allowing for smoother swings. The paddle features a sealed edge combined with foam technology to ensure consistent and stable performance. Whether playing in any weather conditions, the paddle’s performance remains reliable, offering a more dependable feel with every shot.

【Comfortable Ergonomic Design】The ridged, perforated grip is cushioned around the handle, providing ultimate comfort. It absorbs sweat, prevents slipping, and resists wear. The 4.88 inches grip circumference offers great hold, ensuring secure handling during intense rallies. Ideal for beginners, intermediates, and professional players, this pickleball paddle offers excellent playability and durability

USAPA APPROVED: The professionalism of our TENVINA pickleball racket is certified by the USAPA. Multi-layer T700SC carbon fiber, abrasion resistance TMCS and THC-CORE, all come together to empower each match.
